About the Company: Nucleus Software Exports Limited (Nucleus) provides software solutions to the Banking and Financial Services Industry. The Company operates in two segments: products, and projects and services. Its Products includes from sale of licenses and all other related customization, implementation, time and material contracts, fixed price contracts and annual technical service for these licenses. Software projects and services include other time and material contracts and fixed price contracts, whereby no license sale is made by the Company. It has developed solutions spanning from retail banking to corporate banking, cash management, Internet banking and credit cards. Its product FinnOne offers a suite for retail banking applications consisting of modules like customer acquisition system, loan management, delinquency and recovery management, deposits and finance against securities. Its Cash@WillTM and BankONetTM are the offerings in the area of Cash Management and Internet Banking..The company also in the business activities of Products, Software Projects & Services.
